website_summaries.verdict: Good price point per ounce of concentrate that's all natural with no added ingredients.
pros: Works for all types of cleaning, including on oily and greasy substances
Uses only trustworthy ingredients in a product that's made in the United States
Allows you to use different concentration levels for different types of cleaning situations
cons: Doesn't classify as a food-grade orange oil
Some problems with diluting it in water properly

customer_reviews.title: ) Then discovered what a great cleaning product it is
customer_reviews.text: I found orange oil as an ingredient for a natural pest control formula. (kills fire ants, etc.) Then discovered what a great cleaning product it is. A little in a gallon of water really cleans ceramic tile floors and everything else (and it smells so good). Would give 5 stars except I wish it cost less. Still...you really dilute it so maybe it balances out.
customer_reviews.author: annette curtis

customer_reviews.title: WONT Mix into water.
customer_reviews.text: Got this product because it was cheaper than the one I usually buy. BAD mistake on my part!!! It wont mix into water like the other brand I'm used to. This just floats on top like some cheap vegetable oil. The brand I'm used to mixes well with water and turns the water milky white. This stuff smells wonderful and I guess I can use it straight to kill ants or for hard core cleaning but I don't recommend it for general cleaning purposes because it cant be diluted. I see from other reviews I'm not the only one thats had this problem. I wont be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Ophelia

customer_reviews.title: The first whiff wowed me....
customer_reviews.text: I tested it on the kitchen counter and the color and fragrance are exactly what I hoped for....liquid oranges and then some. The fragrance is outstandingly fresh and delicious smelling. I chose this brand because it was pure orange oil and says it's food grade which could only be a plus to me. But I intended it as a cleaning agent and as that it's very encouraging and the smell......that heavenly smell. I regret nothing.....NOTHING. I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Cannot dilute
customer_reviews.text: The mixing recipes for cleaning are bunk, because the oil and water obviously separate. I bought it to kill garden weeds, and the oil stays at the ripe of my big sprayer tank. Cleaning is the same issue unless you use 100% oil vs diluting, which is impossible. The bottle doesn’t describe any other dilution than water.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Does not contain an emulsifier, separates with water, not returnable
customer_reviews.text: This orange oil doesn't contain an emulsifier. When diluted with water for general household cleaning, you must constantly shake this product or it will immediately separate. Much too potent to use undiluted. Unfortunately this item is not returnable, Amazon says "This item can’t be returned since it requires special transportation and handling which we can’t provide". Disappointed this information was not made clear in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Miller

customer_reviews.title: great smell works very well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for thinning tung oil for finishing bowls. It works very well and it cleans my hands without leaving an unpleasant odor after using various finishes. I have been using turpentine in the past but the smell is disturbing to my wife and more dangerous in terms of a risk for spontaneous combustion. It needs to be shaken but the smell is so satisfying and the results so good the money is well worth it for me.
customer_reviews.author: DocRaffetto

customer_reviews.title: Not food safe.
customer_reviews.text: Packaged in a container that is not safe plastic. Not for food use. Only for cleaning. Should have read the description better, but misleading. Can't return cause flammable.
customer_reviews.author: ATHF Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Pure and aromatic. I use it to clean oil ...
customer_reviews.text: Pure and aromatic. I use it to clean oil paints from bushes.
customer_reviews.author: goodbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Cat owners beware!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Why did I not research orange oil before I purchased it? Because you think Orange oil is natural and it's safe but it's NOT for everyone!!! I bought this product as a natural alternative to using weed killer to spray around my fence line and my driveway. It smelled so good I decided I would clean all of my windows, floors, counters, sink, stove, ect. with this orange oil. Then I researched it and found out it causes liver damage in cats!!!!! OMG....... I have 15 cats! I have one cat with liver damage so far. I'm so angry with myself!!!! I guess I will just stick to vinegar and water.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST ORANGE OIL ON THE MARKET!
customer_reviews.text: A quart of this goes a long way! I use it in my cat litter box wipe-down solution (dish soap, hot water plus orange oil). It cleans up burnt pan bottoms great. I mop with about 1/2 fl oz in a bucket of hot water and one cup of vinegar. I have used it in my sonic diffusers, added it a wash load.. placed a pipette of this plus patchouli or Ylang Ylang to a dryer load, on a piece of paper towel, with my woolly dryer balls. None of that nasty drier sheet garbage in THIS house!. The list of uses goes on an on and have just bought my second bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Killing Fire Ants
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great for killing fire ants. Much better than I expected. I used a tablespoon and a half of the orange oil along with three tablespoons of Dawn dish detergent per gallon of water. The only negative thing I can say is that the cap is difficult to turn onto the bottle. I'm not sure if the cap or bottle top is defective? Once it is forced on, it seals okay. It's just annoying.
customer_reviews.author: RUOK

customer_reviews.title: It arrived on time and in good shape
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product so I can make a spray for my plants to keep the white flies away. I haven't had a chance to do it yet, but I hope to do so this weekend. I try very hard not to use poisonous chemicals whenever there is an option that will work as well that won't be detrimental to people, animals and the environment. I hope this new recipe works! The white flies have been around for a while and I can't seem to get rid of them with anything else.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging leaked product
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff for removing adhesive residue. This is the third bottle I have purchased and it works far better than any other cleaner. But, out of three bottles, two leaked, including this one. Why can't the manufacturer put the caps on tight? This bottle was packaged inside a sealed plastic wrapper, so the leaking oil didn't (unlike my first bottle), get out on the box, but it was still wasted required cleaning up the mess. So I can't give this product the 5-star rating it otherwise deserves.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Spade

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% orange oil
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely not 100% orange oil - I don't know what else is in the mixture, but it's very weak/diluted.
customer_reviews.author: Mi

customer_reviews.title: Could be unsafe to open when first purchased!
customer_reviews.text: Long story short, I received this product in a bag not box and bottle was hot. I let the bottles stay inside for two days and attempted to open to use the first time. As I attempted to remove the small piece under the cover, the compressed orange oil exploded into my left eye. I ended up at an eye specialist and had damaged layers of my cornea. I am doing much better but Amazon, Sanco and Bluewater Chem Group haven't reached out yet to make sure this doesn't happen to someone else. The product smells good works good but I give no stars for the scare it put into my left eye. Thanks Mark
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy for cleaning! This brand doesn't cut grease at all!
customer_reviews.text: WEAK! I have an orange oil spray air freshener that works for cleaning many times better. I never realized I could end up with a weak oil.
customer_reviews.author: ana

customer_reviews.title: Effective & smells fine🍊
customer_reviews.text: I love this orange oil! I mainly use it for cleaning & deodorizing. I take a spray bottle that I fill with 30% white vinegar and then about 2 eye droppers full of Orange oil. Shake it well and this will keep ants and bugs away. It cleans counters & sinks too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Grace

customer_reviews.title: I'll continue to order
customer_reviews.text: We bought this 100% cold pressed orange oil to kill fire ants. It works. It doesn't move the colony it actually kills them. I am sensitive to synthetic scents so I really appreciate that this is a natural product with a natural scent. I've already repurchased this and will continue to purchase it as needed.
customer_reviews.author: City of Oaks

customer_reviews.title: kills fire ants see utube
customer_reviews.text: brought to kill firearms. wife saw it was a cleaner I had to buy another bottle for myself
customer_reviews.author: Rockbotm

customer_reviews.title: ANTS B GONE - KILLER PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: We were having issues with fire ants and watched a video of how to get rid of them using 2oz of Orange oil, 2oz of molasses, and 1gal of water. And saturating the infested area. We used this product and tried it and . . . IT WORKED! If you have the same issue, then this is the product you've been waiting for. Ants are GONE! I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Brobst

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 recommend to get rid of bugs
customer_reviews.text: This orange oil pretty much saved my life. I moved to Florida recently and every Sunday there would be all these flying termites that would get IN MY APARTMENT somehow (literally have no idea where they came from). We called the fumigator and that did nothing. So I did some research and figured this was the next best thing according to google. I put it in a spray bottle and sprayed my window frames and door frame, and around some other places they may have got in. I never saw them again! It also smells amazing if you like oranges.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I NEED this is my house! It has a Million uses. It GREAT quality product. It is what it says it is. I've bought other bottles that said it was orange oil but I'd was not! Amazon ROCKS!
customer_reviews.author: Debi Smith

customer_reviews.title: Smells so fresh each time you use it !
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I had a problem with carpenter bee's and had been told it will stop them from coming back. I did spray and they came back once and I have not seen them since. Once I am sure they will not come back I will plug the holds and keep spraying. I have started to use this product for cleaning and It's the only cleaner I've been using since. JUST LOVE IT..
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaner EVeR!!
customer_reviews.text: Best ever for my dark tile floors and leaves zero residue, something I cannot say for ANY OTHER CLEANERS I’ve used, and I have tried them ALL! My house smells so very fresh after using this to clean counters, bathrooms, the fridge and floors! Bonus is that it is 100% natural, no harsh chemicals to harm you, your kids, or cherished fur babies!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Dybalski

customer_reviews.title: cracked lid
customer_reviews.text: Did not happen in transit so was packed that way. Good thing they have that inner seal! I do like the product though and it was in a baggy too. Came fast!
customer_reviews.author: JANA

customer_reviews.title: Effective for killing fire ants.
customer_reviews.text: Mix 2oz Orange Oil, 1oz Molasses & 1oz Dawn liquid soap in 1 Gallon of water. Pour entire contents in the ant bed. The orange oil dissolves the exoskeleton of the ant & the molasses attracts a microbe that eats ants & ants are repelled by molasses.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Walker

customer_reviews.title: A absolutely great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for many reasons. For cleaning, putting a little in my dishwasher and my cloths washer. In the cloths it gives a nice orange smell and both the dishes and cloths come out great. It’s also great for killing fire ants!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fratt

customer_reviews.title: It is orange oil and does what orange oil is expected to do
customer_reviews.text: It is orange oil not much to say about it beyond that. It looks and smells orangey. I'll order again when I run out of this. 32 ounces seems like a lot but depending on what all you do with it it might not be as long a supply as you think.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Are you sure this is 100% orange oil?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because orange oil is wonderful for killing ants. My yard is infested with them. I used the product per instructions, on several ant beds, and the ants were still there the next day. I've used 100% and know it works! I don't think this product is 100% orange oil, in fact, it states 100% "natural." So which one is it?
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Allred

customer_reviews.title: took out my termites
customer_reviews.text: if you have localized termites and want something non-toxic to your family, this stuff is the real deal. as others, I warmed up and mixed with antifreeze before pouring in between the walls. Termite traces (droppings) were gone.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn D

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't mix
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell and the potential of this product, price was fair too, but it does not mix with water. You have to shake (I'm using it in a spray bottle) very often and there is no consistency in use. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Best product EVER
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product...cleans ANYTHING.. Smells GREAT..have ordered 3 times from this company.product comes fast. Will continue to order.I highly recommend this product for ANY use including glass and stainless DOES NOT STREAK.why waste your money on 20 different products when this o ne does it all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cent perfect, order on time and properly packaged - very good supplier.
customer_reviews.text: The orange oil was used to kill fire ants and the lemon grass oil was used as a honey bee attractant when capturing honey bee swarms. Both oils worked very effectively. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great scent of true orange
customer_reviews.text: This is great. It has a truly orange scent. I mixed with white vinegar for cleaning, scent throw is great. Value price, fast delivery. Will purchase again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: MamaRed

customer_reviews.title: Cannot dilute with water
customer_reviews.text: For some reason you cannot dilute this with water. Because if you do it turns into a foamy jelly-like mess. Only alcohol was able to dilute it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Charles

customer_reviews.title: Wow~
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product ~ I have two old dogs so they have done pee &poo on floor. I use this one 10 drop and 1 big bottle of water as a cleaning product. So good ..I recommend this one
customer_reviews.author: Irene C.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: Not all orange oils are created equally. Purchased another brand before this and it was waaay better. The smell of this brand is underwhelming; did nothing for the feral cats; and is very soapy.
customer_reviews.author: deltared01

customer_reviews.title: sticky residue from labels
customer_reviews.text: added to household cleaner- worked well used full strength to remove sticky residue from labels on pill bottles- worked very well
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly scent
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our homemade weed killer which is quite effective. As a bonus found out it's also used as an insecticide, particularly against ants, and a household cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: gilraen

customer_reviews.title: Less expensive than Orange Guard
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it to kill ants in the kitchen and it works great. It's just as effective as Orange Guard but much cheaper. Mix with water and an emulsifier.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnette

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This works real well for what I need it for killing fire ants Just wish you could buy it a gallon size jugs
customer_reviews.author: Billy E.

customer_reviews.title: Not for ants.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money if using to kill or deter ants. This is not the product that works. It has a nice scent that is about all I like about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristel Petty

customer_reviews.title: Yes to this...
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in a timely manner. Packaged securely. The cost is reasonable. We would shop with the vendor again. We plan to use this, along with other solutions, to kill weeds.
customer_reviews.author: ChaCha

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to make a non-toxic fire ant killer. So far, the recipe for mixing it with Dawn and water has worked. I plan to try it for cleaning as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Orange oil
customer_reviews.text: Good product but wife says not nearly as good as TKO product that we have used in the past (could not locate).
customer_reviews.author: L P Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It has a great smell and you can use it to clean everything. Most important thing is that it's natural. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Zaria

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Are use the printer control along with some other products mixed with it and it works great most of my other products as molasses
customer_reviews.author: Wicks

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% D-Limonene
customer_reviews.text: I needed 100% D-Limonene. The label on this bottle when I read the product picture is intentionally tricky. "100% Natural, Biodegradable, and Non-Toxic. D-Limonene is designed to..." So yeah, not what I needed and I waste of money. Would like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Works for Everything -Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Imperative to switch from Chemicals -Laundry /All cleaning Incredible Scent Sumptuous
customer_reviews.author: S Hansen

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: It smells just like oranges...no cemical after smell...it cleans everthing they claim(mirrors!!!) Love this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Gross

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT 100% Orange Oil
customer_reviews.text: This product has a surfactant which allows it to mix with water. It is NOT pure oil. False advertising, avoid at all costs. When you claim something is 100%, make sure it is.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing, cleans every surface I've tried it on, well. Use it as an all purpose cleaner and I haven't been disappointed yet.
customer_reviews.author: Janice W

customer_reviews.title: Most usable oil
customer_reviews.text: I use this for cleaning, laundry, drains. Lasts forever. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaky bottle....not sure if the usage to get rid of fire ants will work!
customer_reviews.text: Although the bottle was sealed in plastic and the safety seal was in place, the bottle had leaked.There was oil in the bag and the box had oil spots too. Seemed like the lid was a little loose but seal was in place. Not sure why it was leaking. Maybe wrap in bubble wrap? Am using the oil for fire ants and tried it today....not sure if it works or not yet!
customer_reviews.author: Barb Gates

customer_reviews.title: Orange oil clezz as ner
customer_reviews.text: I use this to clean my oil paint brushes. So much better than mineral spirits
customer_reviews.author: Aav

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Large amt for the price. We use ours in the diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: reppepdawg

customer_reviews.title: Part of natural weed killer concoction
customer_reviews.text: Used along with other ingredients in a natural weed killer. Works perfectly. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: JAHans1

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This oil is so helpful, organic, pure, and high quality. The price is phenomenal. I use it for many household use and highly recommend this product. Great product and great company!
customer_reviews.author: DharmaPaden.02

customer_reviews.title: Bought to kill
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping to kill and keep ear wigs out my home and garden. Works if direct contact on them. Good for air fresher and cleaning. Not so good in garden. Insects will die if Direct contact as will your plants.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Ryan

customer_reviews.title: It’s very potent!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely effective cleaner; I bought it for ant control and have not used it yet for that, but have high hopes.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Love this orange oil! Great smelling and what a great cleaner! Great deal, thanks!

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy customer
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting this to be leaking when I opened the box! And of course I’m this item is not a returnable item!

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Used it with vinegar to kill weeds and works great!!! Also trying it on my pecks cypress wood ceiling just haven’t started that project

customer_reviews.title: 100% d-limonene as advertised
customer_reviews.text: 100% d-limonene as advertised! Great degreaser, soap additive, ant killer, and scent additive.

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time , nice smell , it keeps the bugs away from my plants ❤️Thank you for the wonderful product

customer_reviews.title: This is what you are looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Very fast delivery and was packaged well. This stuff works great! I would definitely recommend this to others and would purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Orange oil
customer_reviews.text: Ive used it as a herbicide and to add to laundry. Smells great

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent and dont have to use harsh chemicals.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product to obliterate fire ants. It works!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Great product - and safe for the enviroment
customer_reviews.text: Paired with concentrated vinegar, this product kills poison ivy! Kills weeds easily. The property has a pleasant scent after spraying. I really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: The cap doesn’t fit but was sealed for delivery. This an inconvenience on cap. Good price for quantity and quality. Use for cleaning and diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Product is as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I used it as a component of weed killer and to keep ants away. Not a permanent solution, but is a non-chemical solution that works for a time.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D.

customer_reviews.title: Gives that CLEAN smell and feeling
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd bottle that I have purchased and use it daily. I find that I can use on anything and it comes up clean and leave a fresh smell that does last a long time.

customer_reviews.title: more than I expected
customer_reviews.text: this product really works in the washer for very smelly items, funky mildew smells and pet smells.

customer_reviews.title: Zaps odors
customer_reviews.text: Great product...clean, refreshing scent. Mix with water and a little vinegar. Bam!

customer_reviews.text: More oily than any other I’ve bought. Doesn’t mix well at all.

customer_reviews.text: Orange Oil is a excellent cleaner.... and the air smells fresher and cleaner after using this product..

customer_reviews.title: Test run
customer_reviews.text: So far I like it very much as soon as I get more time to use it if it performs as my first test I would probably give it 5stars

customer_reviews.text: The best all purpose cleaner I have found. My customers love the scent.

customer_reviews.text: Product used to clean, add fragrance to room, and recently was great at cleaning a pot a I burned food in.

customer_reviews.text: Use it with vinegar and Dawn dishwashing soap for perfect natural weed killer!

customer_reviews.text: This has been a magic potion. It’s great for gardening, cleaning and scenting.

customer_reviews.text: I have nothing but good things to say about this product.

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I use it for the kitchen and bathrooms. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Nanaa

customer_reviews.title: Kills ants, multi purpose product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I bought this to get rid of the ants..2 oz of this oil, 2oz blue* dish soap and one gallon of water and theyre gone! Much cheaper than the exterminator and far less toxic! Fantastic..would buy again..multi purpose product, great for cleaning too! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: ShawnK.

customer_reviews.title: Best window & all-purpose cleaner, excellent insecticide, smells great, & is non-toxic for humans!
customer_reviews.text: Best window cleaner and all purpose cleaner ever, and kills/repells insects and spiders, smells like fresh oranges. One of the most effective red wasp insecticides I've ever seen. Immediately drops them upon contact. We use on our garden for aphids and other pest insects. Did the job on carpenter ants too. Non-toxic to humans. Win-win-win-win! Cause it's orange, like Trump? LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.. Have been ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for.. Have been combining 2 oz of orange Oil with 2 oz. of Dawn dishing washing liquid with a gallon of water to treat fire ants.. Hopefully it's working..
customer_reviews.author: joanie

customer_reviews.title: Great ant killer!
customer_reviews.text: I live in the south so we have lots of ant. Especially fire ants! We have 2-1/2 areas which we have professionally sprayed but we also have chickens and so spraying chemicals in there pen is not an options. To kill ants, I mix 1 oz. of orange oil, 2 to 3 oz. dish detergent to a gallon of water and slowly pour on mount so that it runs down into the holes in the ground. It kills them and doesn't' hurt pets or plants so it is safe to use in the vegetable garden as well.
customer_reviews.author: Deana

customer_reviews.title: Smells exactly like oranges!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff, add it to cleaners, put a few drops in my wax heater. Made of orange oil from orange peels. Would be nice if the top had a guard of some sort to slow down the pouring, but there is nothing. I have spilled it a few times, leaks out easily. Suggest if you purchase this that you re-package it in a glass container that has a small opening so that you can measure it easily and prevent spills, I plan on doing something like that soon. Otherwise this is a pleasant, natural product and smells exactly like oranges!
customer_reviews.author: hopeful

customer_reviews.title: I use it to kill fire ants
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm to kill fire ant nests! Mix 2 oz. with a gallon of water and add a little surfactant. Pour over the fire ant nest and within 24 hours, the nest is dead. I love that I can use this in my vegetable plots without having to worry about toxins.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gottlieb

customer_reviews.title: Ant Depopulitization
customer_reviews.text: This orange oil didn't smell as strong as some of the others I've had. I use orange oil to fight the ant population in my gardens. What I noticed about this product is that when I make my highly classified recipe I get small white solidified chunks. They look as though I put conditioner in it. It's a clearish liquid in the bottle. This is the first time I've used this brand but I will update as we go along.
customer_reviews.author: DearMammaBlogger

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant and clean smelling orange product than cleans  very well.
customer_reviews.text: I used product for two reasons . #1. To kill red ants(diluted) I bought 2 products . Yours worked far better. I had to order more as I have a big yard.....#2. To clean with ....I 💕 🍊 smells and it is a great cleaner. Will very definitely use again! I am sure there are a great many uses.
customer_reviews.author: J. Clemens

customer_reviews.title: 2 uses so far...not thrilled.
customer_reviews.text: I used 1 capful in the laundry and didn't think it smelled as fresh as using vinegar. I bought this to kill fire ants, though. It killed some, but the next day, they were still walking around. I guess I have to break open the hill with a shovel. I was trying to avoid that. Fire ant bites are miserable.
customer_reviews.author: Thalia S

product_meta.title: Premium Cold Pressed Orange Oil- 16 oz (D-Limonene), All Natural Cold Pressed Orange Oil
product_meta.description: Size:16 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)Cold pressed orange oil is a great alternative to harsh cleaners. This food grade product is derived from the citrus peel of oranges and is a common ingredient in perfume blends and household cleaners. D-limonene is designed to be used as an industrial cleaner and/or hard surface cleaner for difficult to remove grime. It can also be used to make formulated products for applications such as laundry, adhesive removal, or waterless hand cleaner.
feature_bullets: Great Mulit-Use Cleaner: Glass Cleaner, Air Freshener, Adhesive Removal, Oil Spot Cleaner, Counter Top and Hard Surface Cleaner, Floor Cleaner, and Grill Cleaner
Derived from Citrus peel of oranges
For General Cleaning Dilute 2 oz with 1 gallon of water (Shake Well Before Using)
